description: import fix spread between eonia and EuroSTR for PC_EOD_NAMERICAS

processingCommand.script:
cd ${HOME}/scripts/MarketData;
echo ##copying eurostr/Eonia_EuroSTR_PC_EOD_NAMERICAS.xml to Received/common;
cp eurostr/Eonia_EuroSTR_PC_EOD_NAMERICAS.xml Received/common;
echo ##uploading file;
./GlobalMarketDataExecute.sh -update -type:marketratesheet -file:Eonia_EuroSTR_PC_EOD_NAMERICAS -body:body_FO_NA -mds:PC_EOD_NAMERICAS -answer:answer_Eonia_EuroSTR_PC_EOD_NAMERICAS -log:log_update_Eonia_EuroSTR_PC_EOD_NAMERICAS
#echo ##finish uploading file
if [ $? = 0 ] 
then
echo "finished uploading file"
exit 0
else
echo "error uploading file"
exit 1
fi
